data.title: Chengdu Tianfu International Airport: TFU Flights & Terminals
data.meta_description: Tianfu Airport has two terminals. T1 serves international flights and T2 domestic. Metro line 18 and 5 airport bus lines are in operation to/from downtown 50km away.
data.text:
Airport Code: TFU

Location: Konggang Avenue, Lujia Town, Jianyang; about 50 km (31mi) southeast from Chengdu city center

Terminals: The modern airport has 2 terminal buildings well equipped with WIFI, Nursing Room, Left Luggage, places to shop and dine, Lost and Found, and all the other needed service and facilities. T1 is for international flights and T2 is for domestic flights.

T1 International Departure International Arrival

Level 4: check-in, health quarantine, customs & security check, immigration inspection

Level 3 & Level 1: boarding gates

Level 2: arrivals, health quarantine, immigration inspection, baggage claim, customs

Level 1: remote arrivals

T2 Domestic Departure Domestic Arrival Level 4: check-in, security check, boarding gates

Level 2 & Level 1: boarding gates

Ground Transportation Center (GTC): check-in Level 2: arrivals, baggage claim

Level 4: arrivals

Level 1: remote arrivals

1. Close-time for check-in: The close time for domestic flight check-in is 45 minutes before take-off, while that in GTC is 60 minutes prior. That for international flight is decided by the airlines.

2. Visa policies for overseas transit passengers: If the total layover from the scheduled arrival time to the scheduled departure time is less than 24 hours, passengers can enjoy 24-hour visa-free transit. If it is longer than 24 hours, a visa will be needed, except passport holders of 53 countries and whose itineraries are eligible for 144-hour visa-free transit.

3. How to Transfer between T1 and T2: By free APM. It runs from 05:00 till 00:45 the next day in the check-in area and 5:00 to the arrival of the last domestic flight outside the check-in area. The stations are in B2 of both T1 and T2.

Domestic Destinations: Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou, Sanya, Guilin, Lhasa, Jiuzhai, Kunming, Nanjing, Urumqi, Changsha, Wuhan, Qingdao, Xiamen, Nanning, Harbin, Huangshan…

International Destinations: Seoul, Singapore, Bangkok, London …

Lucky Air (8L), Xiamen Air (MF), Spring Airlines (9C), Juneyao Airlines (HO), Shandong Airlines (SC), Shanghai Airlines (FM), Qingdao Airlines (QW), Hainan Airlines (HU), Capital Airlines (JD), China United Airlines (KN), Kunming Airlines (KY), Ruili Airlines (DR), Okay Airways (BK), Colorful Guizhou Airlines (GY), Hebei Airlines (NS), Tianjin Airlines (GS), Donghai Airlines (DZ), Urumqi Air (UQ), Beibu Gulf Airlines (GX), Air Travel (A6), Jiangxi Airlines (RY) …

Metro line 18 connects the airport with Chengdu South Railway Station in town.

Boarding point: In the Ground Transportation Center (GTC) between T1 and T2.

Running Time: 06:03-23:34

Ticket Fare: It costs at least CNY 2 and they further you take, the higher the price. A full single trip to the South Railway Station is CNY10.

Pick-up points: Outside gate 01 of T1 and gate 03 of T2

Interval: 20-30 minutes from 00:00-24:00

Note: There are also long-distance buses running back and forth between the airport and nearby cities including Jianyang, Zigong, Deyang, Rongxian, Lezhi, Anyue, Suining, Renshou, Neijiang, Zizhong, Meishan, Mianyang, Nanchong, Leshan, Hongya and Ya’an.

The pick-up points are respectively outside Gate 02 of T1 and Gate 04 of T2.

Location & Service Time:

T1: Behind Counter B, Level 4; 24 hours a day

T2: Behind Counter G, Level 4; 04:30 - 23:00

Service Fee:

Duration Large size locker (inch)

18*36*37.4 Middle size locker (inch)

18*36*25.6 Small size locker (inch)

18*18*25.6 0-6 hours (Inclusive) CNY20 CNY12 CNY8 6-12 hours (Inclusive) CNY30 CNY20 CNY13 12-24 hours (Inclusive) CNY40 CNY28 CNY18 Over 24 hours

(A fee is charged every 6 hours, and x represents the number of additional charges) 40 + X*5 28 + X*5 18 + X*2

Luggage Packing

Location & Service Time

T1: Beside Gate 11, Level 4; 120 minutes prior to the first flight departure to 45 minutes before the last flight departure

T2: Beside Gate 21 and Gate 24, Level 4; 120 minutes prior to the first flight departure to 45 minutes before the last flight departure

GTC: Beside Counter K, Level 1; 06:00 to 60 minutes prior to the last flight departure in T2

Service Fee: CNY10-20 per luggage; the wrapping materials cost CNY15-40 per piece

Free Wifi

Passengers can get access to the free Wi-Fi with their passport through self-service queueing machine.

Lost & Found

T1: Behind Counter B, Level 4; 24 hours a day; 028-86906577

T2: Behind Counter G, Level 4; 04:30 – 23:00; 028-86906777

Nursing Facilities

Baby Care Room: Next to washing rooms in both terminals

Children’s Playground:

T1: Next to Gate 30 of Corridor C, L4 and Gate 114 of Corridor A, L3;

T2: Next to Gate 214 of Corridor A, L2 and Gate 223 of Corridor C, L2.

Hotel

It is connected with T1, T2and GTC and passengers can walk to the check-in counters of both terminals in 5 minutes from the hotel. It opens all day long.

There are restaurants providing both Chinese and western food, cafes and stores selling clothes, books, cosmetics and more. They scatter in the terminal buildings for passengers’ convenience.
